name: Dreams Meets Nightmares
description:
A fighting game based on childhood toys gone rogue and now it is up to you to defeat the rogue toys and their boss to bring them back to their normal selves. 

Milad Hashemi - Student ID: 2026379 - Producer

Michael Hennessy - Student ID: 2066965 - Design
